onboarding.sharedListText: Simplify your to-dos and stay in sync with your partner through shared lists for seamless collaboration
onboarding.habitTrackerText: Cultivate shared habits and goals, reinforcing accountability and wellness in your relationship
onboarding.sharedNotesText: Enhance communication and create a shared digital space for notes, fostering intimacy and connection between you and your partner.

home.title: Home
home.premiumText: Unlock premium features and supercharge your experience!

forms.deleteText: Are you sure you want to delete this List?
forms.noDeletePermission: You do not have permission to delete this List!

habits.title: Habits
habits.dateFuture: Selected date is in the future. Cannot mark habit as done.
habits.addHabit: Start by adding a new habit

deleteHabit.deleteText: Are you sure you want to delete this habit?

editHabit.sharepartnerText: Pair with partner to share this

selectName.errorLimit: Habit name should not exceed 60 characters.

settings.title: Settings
settings.appDescription:
Stay organized and connected with your partner.
Enhance accountability and productivity in your relationship with features like joint habit tracking, shared to-do lists, and note-taking.

subscription.manageSubscriptionsInfo: To manage user subscriptions, go to Settings > [ your_name] > Subscription >  Habts Us
subscription.manageAndroidSubscriptionsInfo: To manage Android subscriptions, open Google Play > Profile > Payments & subscriptions.
subscription.partnerManagement: Subscription management is handled by your partner

sharedListModal.addList: Start by adding a new list item
sharedListModal.createJoinTeam: Create or join a team to share with partners
sharedListModal.listNameLength: List name should not exceed 60 characters.
sharedListModal.addListError: Error adding/shared list. Please try again.

validationError.titleLength: List name should not exceed 60 characters.

partnerPairing.title: Partner Pairing
partnerPairing.description: Partner Pairing enables seamless data sharing. Connect with your partner to effortlessly share and track Habit data and collaborative lists. Enhance your journey, stay synchronized, and achieve your goals together!
partnerPairing.inviteMessage: Hello! 😊 I found this amazing productivity and accountability app designed to promote growth in the relationship, helping partners stay organized and accountable together.
partnerPairing.pairingInstructions: To get started, download the app and use the code below to pair up:

alert.confirmMessage: Are you sure you want to unpair your team?
alert.errorMessage: Team unpairing failed. Please try again.

enterPartnerCode.success: You have been added to the team

404error.alreadyInTeam: You are already in a team.
404error.cannotCreateWithYourself: Cannot create a team with yourself.
404error.invitedUserAlreadyInTeam: The invited user is already in a team.

subscription.title: Subscription Packages

features.title: Unlimited Habits
features.description: Access to an unlimited number of habits for comprehensive tracking.

features.title: Unlimited Notes Taking
features.description: Take unlimited notes to capture your thoughts and ideas as a couple.

features.title: Advanced Analytics Data
features.description: Gain detailed insights and analytics to track and optimize your progress.

features.title: Custom Themes
features.description: Personalize your app with a variety of custom themes and color options.

features.title: Reminders
features.description: Keep each other accountable! Receive alerts when your partner completes tasks.

features.title: Priority Support
features.description: Receive priority support and assistance for any issues or inquiries.

subscription.partnerText: Your partner gets Premium for Free

texts.welcome: 🎉 Welcome to your Daily Summary! Here, you can get a quick overview of your daily Habits and Lists. 📊
texts.createList: 📝 Ready to create a new list? Simply tap on the "Add a New List" button below!
texts.exploreLists: 📜 Explore all your lists in one place! Here, you'll find a comprehensive view of all your lists.
texts.customizeList: ✏️ Easily customize your list name, color, and deadline with just a tap!
texts.revealEditMenu: 👈 Swipe Left to reveal the list edit menu! <<< Don't miss the Edit button.
texts.startJourney: 🌟 Start your journey by adding a new habit!
texts.revealMenu: Swipe Left 👈 to reveal the menu... Don't miss it! Click ✅ to mark a habit as done, and "❌" to undo!
texts.checkCompletionStatus: Check task completion status for you and your partner. For example, if it shows "1/1", it means you completed the task ✅. If it shows "2/2", both you and your partner have completed the task 🎉.
texts.currentStreak: See your current streak and keep the fire burning! 🔥
texts.customizePrivacySettings: Slide left 👈 to reveal the edit menu and customize privacy settings and more! 🚀
texts.indicator: Indicator: 🔒 for private or 🔗 for shared Notes
